thread.title: jenny boss
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by jenny boss

author: jenny boss
title: jenny boss
text: I loved the amount of information on the site so I had an understanding of what I wanted and what questions to ask before I sought referrals. I was sent 3 companies who were all very professional and the Quote: s were similar- this made deciding who to use difficult but as a consumer that's a pretty good position to be in. Finn followed up and responded to questions I had. Don't get ripped off by the shonkys out there- make this site your first research area and you cant go wrong.
